name: HAVOC (itch) (iugix)
description:
Try to destroy as many platforms as you can.

Keep an eye to the platform color:
- white, 1 point
- gold, 2 points
- ninja, hard to spot but gives 5 points
- red, you can guess

And if you are fast enough, you can enter the Golden Age, where every platform worth double points!

Don't forget, 
More destruction, more fun.
